name: Greedy and lost
description:
RUN!
A CAVE-IN!

You are now trapped under the surface.
Use your dwarf pickaxe and senses to find a way out before exhaustion kills you.
However... you feel something else.
Alterium, the living metal.
The most precious and expensive thing a dwarf dreams to find...
Will you risk your life for it?

CONTROLS:
WASD or arrows: move around
Space: Mine

TIPS:
Watch out for change in light, it indicates everything.

Made for Trijam 204; Blocked!
Made in around 5h.
